ingredients.item: 4 sprigs rosemary, leaves torn from the stem

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6. Heat the butter and half the oil in a large roasting tin and add the new potatoes when hot. Cook in the middle of the oven for 30 minutes until golden. Remove and crush roughly with a fork.
Add the rosemary leaves, olives and remaining oil and cook for a further 20 minutes. Just before serving, taste and season if needed
